Class NewGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

              • Game.NewGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class NewGame
extends javax.swing.JFrame

    New Game

    Creates GUI when user clicks to load a New game
    and fills in the info to be displayed in tables

    Author:
    nav_k
    See Also:

        public static void createPlayerFrame()
        The window opens up when user clicks on Play Game button. The method helps to display player cards, personality card and city area card if any according to the player's turn.
